item.title: reprex: Help me help you
item.description: …if you give a man a fish he is hungry again in an hour. If you teach him to catch a fish you do him a good turn. The quote is often attributed to a Chinese proverb and is excerpted from Anne Isabella Thackeray Ritchie’s novel, Mrs. Dymond (1885). The point is well understood – one of the most important things we can teach our students is how they can help themselves.
